description:
Are you searching for a great restaurant?  Want to SAYV money and get an EXCLUSIVE deal on a salon service?  Looking for the doctor closest to you? Do you have the User Friendly Phone Book (UFPB) and wish to instantly save the dentist’s number and deal in your phone?
 
You want local business information at your fingertips.  You want reliable information provided by people in your neighborhood.  You want thousands of EXCLUSIVE offers from Local Area Business. You want to create a digital connection with your yellow pages.
 
Download SAYV. Get Local. Exclusive. Deals.
 
The SAYV app provides immediate access to all your favorite local businesses with money saving deals.  Download the SAYV app today and discover discounts and local businesses in your backyard or grab the User Friendly Phone Book and scan QR codes for additional information about all of your favorite local businesses.
 
Search Local Business
- Find 20MM local business by typing in their name or category including restaurants, doctors and more
- Location recognition pinpoints where you are to deliver nearby search results.
- Found the business you’re looking for?  Download the number to your phone.  Get step by step driving directions; find money sayving coupons and more!
- Find a business in the UFPB download it directly to your phone.
 
SAYV Money
- Get local deals from thousands of businesses nearby.
- Search deals by category and offer.
- SAYV the deals to your phone for later use.
- Get Alerts when new deals are added.
- Grab the User Friendly Phone Book and use the QR code reader to find additional sayvings.
 
Personalize and Share
- SAYV numbers to your favorite businesses.
- SAYV your deals.
- Share your favorite business and deals with your friends on Facebook and Twitter.
 
QR code reader
- Scan and Go – scan your favorite local businesses from the User Friendly Phone Book and download coupons and business information directly to your phone without searching.
- Scan a national company and the reader will detect the location closest to you
 
User Friendly Phone Book Companion
- Love using the yellow pages but hate dialing in numbers?  Scan all the information directly from the book to your phone.
- Want to immediately find a local business’ location after finding them in the yellow pages? Scan and go
